text:
When viewing any of the test files in batik-svgbrowser.jar, I get this error alert:

file:/home/david/xml-batik/samples/test/opcaity.svg:0
An I/O error occured while processing the URI
'file:/home/david/xml-batik/samples/#Batik_Squiggle' specified on the element <use>

Apparently,the last <use> in the opacity.svg file:

   <use xlink:href="../batikLogo.svg#Batik_Tag_Box" />

goes to batikLogo.svg in the samples directory, but then when the browser goes
to the Tag_Box code:

         <g id="Batik_Tag_Box" >
            <rect x="1" y="1" width="446" height="496"
                  style="fill:none; stroke:black" />
            <use xlink:href="#Batik_Squiggle"
                 transform="translate(418,467) scale(0.5, 0.5)" />
        </g> <!-- End Batik_Tag_Box -->

The second local reference to #Batik_Squiggle gets misdirected.
creator: david@catcode.com
